name: Krishnanand A
objective: I am a skilled software developer with a background in computer science and full-stack development, having hands-on experience in microservices and REST API frameworks, front-end development, databases, object-oriented programming (OOPs), and deployment, effectively manage these aspects using version control .

projects.title: ResNet
projects.description: Developed a solar-powered disaster network ensuring reliable communication during emergencies, fostering global community resilience.
projects.technologies: React Native, SQLite, IoT, WebSockets, API
responsibilities: Designed and implemented a mobile application using React Native.
Developed and managed the SQLite database for offline data storage.
Built a communication server using IoT device (NodeMCU)
Utilized WebSockets for real-time communication and API for backend services.
Ensured robust and reliable communication infrastructure during emergencies.

projects.title: Document Manager
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive document management system using Flask and SQLite3 to facilitate the upload, viewing, updating, and deletion of documents.
responsibilities: Implemented backend with Flask and SQLite3
Developed RESTful APIs for CRUD operations.
Created responsive UI with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Ensured secure user authentication and data validation.

projects.title: Gladius Schild CVE App
projects.description: Built an app to collect CVE data from multiple NVD APIs, providing extensive data coverage for viewing and searching CVE information.
responsibilities: Developed a web application using React JS for the frontend.
Implemented backend services using Express JS to handle API requests.
Integrated multiple NVD APIs to collect CVE data.
Designed and managed MySQL database for storing and querying CVE information.
Created a user-friendly interface for viewing and searching CVE data.

projects.title: Placement Companion
projects.description: Developed an Android app to connect students with placement drive information and assist placement coordinators in managing applicant data.
responsibilities: Designed and developed an Android application using Android Studio and Java.
Implemented Firebase for real-time data synchronization and storage.
Created user interfaces and functionalities for students to access placement drive information.
Developed features for placement coordinators to manage applictions and generate reports
